rooms.description: Spacious open-plan area combining living space, kitchen, dining area integrated seamlessly into one, designed for social gatherings and family activities. Features natural light from large windows facing north to promote energy and vitality.
The primary bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in the northwest corner for a balance of privacy and auspiciousness.
Second bedroom suitable for joint family members, ensuring comfort while maintaining adequate privacy. Ideally located in the northeast corner to harness positive energies.
Third bedroom designed with ample storage and seating areas; positioned in the southeast quadrant for balanced energy flow.
Integrated into the open-plan kitchen-living area. Features a central dining table and ample space for gatherings, with windows providing light from the west.
Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living room; designed for efficient workflow. Natural lighting from the south to facilitate culinary activities and social interaction.

openings.description: Main entry door located at the north-western side of the plot, in line with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Secondary entrance for easy access and emergency exit, positioned on the eastern facade.
Rooftop terrace access door located centrally at the rear, designed to connect ground level with the rooftop.
Strategically placed windows and cross ventilation openings to ensure fresh air flow in line with Vastu principles.

central_courtyard.description: A serene open space at the center of the bungalow to serve as a communal gathering area and enhance natural lighting, promoting balance and harmony.

rooftop_terrace.description: An elevated outdoor living space on the roof with landscaping features, seating, and privacy screens. Provides an excellent vantage point over the entire property.
rooftop_terrace.accessibility: via staircase in the rear of the bungalow
